description:
This is a Ruger LCP 380 ACP that is practically new with a professionally polished barrel, guide rod, and feed ramp. It has had only 30 rounds through it. It includes factory box and all factory items and parts. It also includes 4 magazines (10 round magazine, 7 round magazine, and two 6 round magazines with pinky extensions), hogue grip, Kydex pocket holster, and 25 rounds of 380 ACP (hornady critical defense). My asking price for the gun, the extras, and the custom work is $475. The buyer must have a conceal weapons license, valid Florida driver's lincense, and must be willing to complete a bill of sale.

Contact information:

Adrian: 305-790-3936 (text or call)
title: Ruger LCP 380 ACP with Extras
